abstract: Two-day retreat held by Jeb Bush in Miami Beach for major donors and fund-raisers offers glimpse into how Bush's likely presidential campaign will be conducted on his own terms; Bush seems intent on broadcasting more contemporary version of what his aides say is his proudly ideological conservatism, one that is reflected in environmentally-conscious locale of Miami Beach.
lead_paragraph: In his inaugural gathering of major donors for a widely expected presidential run, Jeb Bush displayed an unconventional approach that busted many Republican stereotypes.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Adopts a Surprising Style in Eco-Friendly Miami Beach
headline.print_headline: Bush Adopts a Surprising Style in Eco-Friendly Miami Beach

snippet: In his inaugural gathering of major donors for a widely expected presidential run, Jeb Bush displayed an unconventional approach that busted many Republican stereotypes.
